data.why:
Immediately I plan on contributing/building XUL related modules

    1) A perl module that transforms XUL into HTML 2) A perl module
    that transforms XUL into Tk 2) A perl module that transforms XUL
    into GNOME/GTK+

    I would then like to contribute to a sprite based game library
    something like pygame for perl. But most immediately I want to focus
    on XUL.
